IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: LSA ELMS PROPERTY, INC. WAS ORGANIZED TO LEASE A FACILITY TO LSA ELMS AT TANGLEWOOD, INC. AN AFFILIATED TAX-EXEMPT ENTITY WHO PROVIDES LONG-TERM NURSING CARE TO AN AGED POPULATION.
IRS990.MissionDescription: LSA ELMS PROPERTY, INC. WAS ORGANIZED TO LEASE A FACILITY TO LSA ELMS AT TANGLEWOOD, INC. AN AFFILIATED TAX-EXEMPT ENTITY WHO PROVIDES LONG-TERM NURSING CARE TO AN AGED POPULATION.
IRS990.Description: LSA ELMS PROPERTY, INC. ("ELMS PROPERTY") OWNS THE LAND AND BUILDING LOCATED AT 3750 HARPER ROAD IN CLEMMONS, NC. THE CORPORATION LEASES THE BUILDING TO LSA ELMS AT TANGLEWOOD, INC., AN ASSISTED LIVING FACILITY THAT OFFERS SERVICES TO PEOPLE OF ALL FAITHS AND ECONOMIC STATUS.AS LESSOR, ELMS PROPERTY CHARGES REASONABLE LEASE PAYMENTS SUFFICIENT TO PROVIDE ON-GOING UPKEEP OF THE FACILITY.

AddressUS.AddressLine1: 1416 S MARTIN LUTHER KING JR AVE

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Uncertain Tax Positions Under FIN 48:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Effective October 1, 2009, the Organization implemented the new accounting requirements associated with uncertainty in income taxes using the provisions of Financial Accounting Standards Board ("FASB") ASC 740, Income Taxes. Using that guidance, tax positions initially need to be recognized in the financial statements when it is more-likely-than-not the positions will be sustained upon examination by the tax authorities. It also provides guidance for derecognition, classification, interest and penalties, accounting in interim periods, disclosure and transition. As of September 30, 2010, the Organization has no uncertain tax positions that qualify for either recognition or disclosure in the financial statements.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 3
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: LSA MANAGEMENT INC PROVIDES MANAGEMENT SERVICES TO ALL LSA AFFILIATES

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD RECEIVES THE FORM 990 PRIOR TO THE FILING DEADLINE IN ORDER TO REVIEW. REVIEW IS DOCUMENTED IN THE JANUARY MINUTES.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ON AN ANNUAL BASIS, THE BOARD RECEIVES A COPY OF THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND THE POLICY IS REVIEWED AT A REGULARLY SCHEDULED BOARD MEETING. EACH MEMBER SIGNS A STATEMENT INDICATING THEIR COMPLIANCE WITH THE POLICY. WHEN NEW MEMBERS JOIN THE BOARD MID-TERM, THEY ALSO RECEIVE THIS INFORMATION AND COMPLETE THE SAME STATEMENT INDICATING THEIR COMPLIANCE WITH THE POLICY.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ALL COMPENSATION LIMITS ARE COMPARED TO STATE AND NATIONAL RANGES BASED ON FACILITY SIZE AND EXPERIENCE OF STAFF. THE BOARD APPROVES THE COMPENSATION OF THE PRESIDENT.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FORMS ARE POSTED ON GUIDESTAR AND AVAILABLE AT THE LSA OFFICE LOCATED IN SALISBURY, NC.
THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE FUNCTIONS AS THE AUDIT COMMITTEE AND PERFORMS THE DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES AS INDICATED ON PAGE 12, PART XI, LINE 2C. THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED SINCE LAST YEAR.
